item.description:
This event aims to highlight stories that too often remain hidden in hospital rooms, to challenge the stereotypes of those who seek an alternative, to bring together women and their community to realize the shared experience of childbirth.

A story slam is a contest of words held in a supportive space featuring both known and undiscovered talent. All are welcome. Each story will be five minutes. Winner selected by audience.

At this story slam, we want to unpack joyful, ordinary, and devastating experiences that define childbirth in the U.S., to open up the conversation, and serve as a launch point for action.

This event is FREE and Open to Public!!!

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Birth Story Slam
